name: FurAffinity Forums - Dark Theme (1.0.6)
description: Changes the default Xenforo theme into a Dark Mode, allowing for better browsing in low light situations.
additional_info: Urgent update Userstyles.org appeared to roll-back updates from 1.0.5 down to 1.0.2. The update dated 14th October 2016 is the 1.0.6 update and the latest to be available. ------------------------------------------------------------ Version 1.0.2 - Removes fixed position usercp menus (Code left intact, just commented out in case users want to reinstate them.) - Fixed hover bug with external links. Likely to be final revision, after submitting proposed theme to FA for installation ------------------------------------------------------------ Version 1.0.1 - Removes ASCII "squares" from report buttons ------------------------------------------------------------ Version 1.0 (Beta Release) -100% Completion - Fixes bugs noted in previous release, other bugs may be present, please report them in the comments section below. ------------------------------------------------------------ Version 0.9a (Alpha Release) - Can be used, but may produce interesting effects - 99% Completion - Minor colour bugs with active buttons (Buttons that are selected by default, such as submit) - Avatar borders remain default styled - Some text remains in default style (Profile pages) - Some text illegible due to colour clash with background colours - Placeholder text in "input" boxes may be somewhat illegible ("QuickSearch & "StatusUpdate" are two examples)
